item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, April 3, 2025 at 2:55 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Web Server for AoE 1, 2 and 3 DE supporting LAN multiplayer 100% offline (163 points | 17 comments)
2. Tell HN: Announcing tomhow as a public moderator (1330 points | 373 comments)
3. TV Garden (312 points | 54 comments)
4. An open source, self-hosted implementation of the Tailscale control server (67 points | 8 comments)
5. Pico.sh – SSH powered services for developers (285 points | 66 comments)
6. The reality of working in tech: We're not hired to write code (2023) (37 points | 18 comments)
7. Minimal CSS-only blurry image placeholders (87 points | 20 comments)
8. Animals Made from 13 Circles (2016) (445 points | 82 comments)
9. Multi-Token Attention (67 points | 22 comments)
10. Search could be so much better. And I don't mean chatbots with web access (6 points | 1 comment)
11. MIT 6.5950 Secure Hardware Design – An open-source course on hardware attacks (66 points | 2 comments)
12. Apple's Cubify Anything: Scaling Indoor 3D Object Detection (74 points | 8 comments)
13. Why I Maintain a 17 Year Old ThinkPad (5 points | discuss)
14. Tech companies are telling immigrant employees on visas not to leave the U.S. (59 points | 13 comments)
15. Ploopy Classic 2 open source trackball (48 points | 12 comments)

18. UpCodes (YC S17) Is Hiring SWEs and CSMs to make construction more productive ( | hide)
19. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (April 2025) (160 points | 249 comments)
20. Digital Archivists: Protecting Public Data from Erasure (147 points | 36 comments)
21. Search-R1: Training LLMs to Reason and Leverage Search Engines with RL (15 points | discuss)
22. Why I don't discuss politics with friends (55 points | 173 comments)
23. How Google built its Gemini robotics models (129 points | 49 comments)
24. Are people bad at their jobs or are the jobs just bad? (135 points | 161 comments)
25. When Jorge Luis Borges met one of the founders of AI (105 points | 30 comments)
26. Chronic ethanol produces sex-dependent impairments in striatum computations (38 points | 27 comments)
27. Hacking the call records of millions of Americans (93 points | 16 comments)
28. Show HN: Mermaid Chart VS Code Plugin: Mermaid.js Diagrams in Visual Studio Code (86 points | 32 comments)
29. Sailing from Berkeley to Hawaii in a 19ft Sailboat (108 points | 60 comments)
30. Dipping my toes in OpenBSD, in Amsterdam (54 points | 7 comments)
